definition: chain/cable (unit of length: 100 fathoms, about 185 m)/chain (unit of length: 66 feet, about 20 m)/to chain/to enchain

sentences.english: When it comes to decay, Streptococcus mutans is the bacterial strain that does the most damage.
sentences.chinese: 當發生齲齒，鏈球菌在破壞中起到主要作用。

sentences.english: The hammer is a metal ball attached to a wire and a handle.
sentences.chinese: 鏈球是一個連接了一根鐵鏈和把手的金屬球。

sentences.english: Of the 14.5 million pneumococcal cases, 95% were attributable to pneumonia.
sentences.chinese: 95%的鏈球菌疾病可歸因於肺炎。

sentences.english: The disease Streptococcus suis spreads very fast.
sentences.chinese: 豬鏈球疾病蔓延速度非常快。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the prevention and control measures of the pig streptococcus disease.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討人豬鏈球菌病的防治措施。

sentences.english: Conclusion Streptococcus pneumoniae infection was common in children with ALRI.
sentences.chinese: 結論肺炎鏈球菌是兒童ALRI的常見病原。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the relationship of age with mutans streptococci (MS) colonization in infants and toddlers .
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解變形鏈球菌在嬰幼兒牙面上的定植時間。

sentences.english: Computer artwork of chains of Streptococcus pneumoniae bacteria.
sentences.chinese: 肺炎鏈球菌的電腦繪圖。

sentences.english: Streptococcus was resistant against penicillin and ampicillin.
sentences.chinese: 鏈球菌對青黴素和氨苄西林明顯耐藥。

sentences.english: So the antibodies mistake the basal ganglia for strep and attack.
sentences.chinese: 因此你的抗體錯誤地把基底節當成鏈球菌來攻擊。

sentences.english: It does not prevent infection by hemolytic streptococci.
sentences.chinese: 它並不能防止溶血性鏈球菌的感染。

sentences.english: Streprococci and staphylocci are responsible for a wide variety of infections.
sentences.chinese: 鏈球菌和葡萄球菌是引起各種感染的原因。

sentences.english: Conclusions In children, distribution feature of normal flora was that:the Streptococcus viridans was main.
sentences.chinese: 結論兒童正常菌羣的分佈特徵以草綠色鏈球菌爲主。

sentences.english: Intraperitoneal injection of Streptococcus suis resulted in a time-dependent modulation of hepatic drug-metabolizing enzymes activities in mice.
sentences.chinese: 評價豬鏈球菌感染對小鼠肝臟藥物代謝酶活性的影響。

sentences.english: This study indicates that relationship between streptococcicosis and formula feeds quality.
sentences.chinese: 本文也揭示了鏈球菌病與餌料質量的關係。

sentences.english: This review introduces the present study state of the psoriasis evoked by streptococcal infection.
sentences.chinese: 本文就鏈球菌感染誘發銀屑病的研究現狀作一綜述。
